**/rules** - to keep up to date with all the rules
**/admin** - use this command if you need an administrator to help you with controversial issues, resolve conflicts between members, or provide technical support

üí° For every ‚Äú**Thank you**‚Äù and **5+ reactions** to your post you get **1 point**. Time to collect activity bonuses!

**The 4th mint of TON DNS Club NFT has already started!**

Today, the [**TON Foundation officially endorsed**](https://t.me/toncommunitychannel/941) our project. To celebrate, we are launching a sale of club NFTs.

ü¶Ü Time is limited. All details and conditions are available [here.](https://t.me/web3ton/298)

**Community, time to choose: where do we chat next?**

Right now we‚Äôve got two community spaces:

1Ô∏è‚É£ [**The first one**](https://t.me/ton_dns) ‚Äî familiar and buzzing. But the downside: RU & EN are mixed together, and topics have no structure.

2Ô∏è‚É£ [**The second one**](https://t.me/web3jetton) ‚Äî a leftover from earlier days, quiet for now, but with threads and a neat split by languages and topics.

**‚ùì**** Question to you: do we move the action to the second chat or keep hanging out where we are?
